Notes.Text:
This update for postgresql15 fixes the following issues:

Upgrade to 15.13:

 - CVE-2025-4207: Fixed PostgreSQL GB18030 encoding validation can read one byte past end of allocation for text that fails validation (bsc#1242931)

Changelog:

https://www.postgresql.org/docs/release/15.13/
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: Buffer over-read in PostgreSQL GB18030 encoding validation allows a database input provider to achieve temporary denial of service on platforms where a 1-byte over-read can elicit process termination.  This affects the database server and also libpq.  Versions before PostgreSQL 17.5, 16.9, 15.13, 14.18, and 13.21 are affected.
